attributes.action: Petition the UK Government to abolish the BBC TV Licence fee
attributes.additional_details: Viewers who stream live tv or watch other channels should not be penalised by being taxed via a licence fee. It is outdated and the BBC should be self funding.
attributes.background: For the UK Government to abolish the BBC TV Licence fee. It is no longer value for money or fit for purpose.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish the tv licence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
